commentList.content: 太坑人了，外地人不要打電話問酒店北京的核酸和出行，太坑人了！提前打電話問外地車能開到酒店嗎，因為酒店位於2環以內，聽說外地車不能進，但酒店答覆說辦理進京證就能進！結果呢，辦理了進京證，還是不能進，剛進二環就被交警攔下了，我們衹能把車停在二環外收費停車場，然後打車再去酒店！！還問了酒店核酸檢測，說24小時都檢，結果到了后才知道晚上9點多以後根本不能檢！不知道就答覆不知道，不要給外地人完全錯誤的信息，真的很費錢費時讓人很生氣！！
commentList.translatedContent: It's too embarrassing. Outsiders don't call the hotel to ask about nucleic acid and travel in Beijing. It's too embarrassing! Called in advance to ask if the non-local car can drive to the hotel, because the hotel is located within the 2nd ring road, I heard that the non-local car cannot enter, but the hotel replied that the Beijing entry permit can enter! As a result, after applying for the Beijing Entry Permit, we still could not enter. We were stopped by the traffic police as soon as we entered the Second Ring Road. We could only park the car in the toll parking lot outside the Second Ring Road, and then took a taxi to the hotel! ! I also asked the hotel for nucleic acid testing, and said that it will be tested 24 hours a day. After the result arrived, I realized that it could not be tested after 9 pm! If you don't know, then answer if you don't know. Don't give out-of-towners completely wrong information. It's really expensive and time-consuming and makes people very angry! !

commentList.content: 去看如夢定了這家酒店，位置超級好，出門就是南鑼鼓巷，旁邊就是地鐵站，不管是去豆腐池衚衕、鴉兒衚衕還是什剎海、故宮、天安門都很方便，晚上白天外麪都很安靜，打開窗帘就可以感受北京衚衕的早上。酒店風格很喜歡，進門溫馨，一下子把寒氣隔絕在外麪，黑白的房間風格布局簡約大方，進門無需插房卡就自動打開燈光、窗帘和暖氣，早上晚上都有餐食很好吃。酒店工作人員都很親切，有問題第一時間解決。最後最後肖肖的花牆很好看，每次路過都忍不住拍照，向日葵向陽而生，送的咖啡很好喝，還給了我明信片，房間的小禮物也超級喜歡。很開心讓我感受如夢的同時也有一個非常舒適居住環境。

The black and white room style is simple and generous. The lights, curtains and heating are automatically turned on without inserting a room card. The meals are delicious in the morning and evening. The hotel staff are very kind and solve problems as soon as possible. In the end, Xiao Xiao’s flower wall was very beautiful, and I couldn’t help but take pictures every time I passed by. The sunflowers were growing towards the sun, the coffee they sent was delicious, I also gave me postcards, and the small gifts in the room were also super favorite. I am very happy to have a very comfortable living environment while making me feel like a dream.

commentList.translatedContent: It is really rare to be in a location like Nanluo! The room has its own characteristics. It is the first time I feel the brand of CityGo and I have a good impression. There is red jujube barley water in the lobby, although the front desk did not take the initiative to greet me, I still poured it myself.

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的賓客您好!我們不僅地理位置好,還有同城免費的行李寄送,五環內任意火車站、酒店、機場均可送達,讓您輕鬆出行!另外周邊離網紅一條街簋街、南鑼鼓巷、鼓樓、后海、什剎海等都非常的近,地鐵6號線8號線近需步行50米,無論出行還是遊玩都非常便利哦!期待您下次光臨!

commentList.content: 非常棒的酒店！地鐵上來就是，院內還可以停車，智能設施，電動窗帘，衛生間的感應燈，床頭的手機支架和小夜燈，機器人送早餐到房間，都特別人性化。稍有不足就是瓶裝水是兩小瓶，我雖然是一個人入住，都感覺有些不夠喝。
commentList.translatedContent: Very good hotel! The subway is up there, parking in the courtyard, smart facilities, electric curtains, sensor lights in the bathroom, mobile phone holders and night lights at the bedside, and robots delivering breakfast to the room are all very user-friendly. The slight shortcoming is that the bottled water is two small bottles. Although I stayed alone, I felt that it was not enough to drink.

commentList.content: 房間很小，剛好一個大床，放點行李，這個價格，在北京算不錯啦，位置超好，出門就是地鐵站，裏面還有個挺高級的西餐廳，好說走的那天去吃的，實在趕不贏了，附近景點也多，什沙海，恭王府都很近，那個南門烤肉的羊肉串真是吃了還想吃
commentList.translatedContent: The room is very small, just a big bed, some luggage, the price is not bad in Beijing, the location is super good, just go out to the subway station, there is a very high-end western restaurant inside, it is easy to say that I went to eat on the day I left, really Can’t catch up, there are many nearby attractions, Shishahai and Prince Gong’s Mansion are very close, the lamb skewers of Nanmen Barbecue I really want to eat it.

commentList.content: 服務貼心又有趣，疫情期間沒有提供堂食早餐。去得早也提前幫我安排升級入住了。整體小而美，床品特別舒服，秒睡着！🎄平安夜還送了蘋果🍎
commentList.translatedContent: The service is considerate and interesting. No dine-in breakfast was provided during the epidemic. Went early and arranged for me to upgrade in advance. The whole is small and beautiful, the bedding is particularly comfortable, and you fall asleep in seconds! 🎄I gave out an apple on Christmas Eve🍎

ratingCalculationInfo.title: How ratings are calculated
ratingCalculationInfo.content: To ensure the authenticity of the ratings that are displayed, we don't simply calculate an average. Instead, we make scientific calculations based on the review credibility and the freshness of the guest's experience to get the final rating.
